casebody.data:
HARVEY
v.
McLAUGHLIN. No. 553P05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. November 15, 2005. Michael C. Allen, Meredith T. Black, Raleigh, for Patrick D. McLaughlin. Donald J. Dunn, New Bern, for John Harvey.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 14th day of November 2005 by Defendant for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 15th day of November 2005."
